::Prowl::

Prowl turns to fly toward Halucigen at the becking, when four blasts
smash into his back, doing heavy damage to the armor there. He roars
yet again, forgetting about Halucigen for the moment and spinning
around, flying off toward Divebomb.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> ::Divebomb/Rampage/Razorclaw::
> He shakes his head, dodging the blaster fire. Then, his optics pick 
> up a large object, that seems to be destroying bots. He laughs to 
> himself, <easy target>... or so he thinks. He fires four particle 
> blasts at the bot, Prowl.
> 
> Rampage growls, and continues firing on Astral, and his party.
> 
> Razorclaw sees the perfect opertunity. Khonkolor was looking up, 
> and firing at Divebomb. Razorclaw puts all of his effort of the 
> moment into his action, he fires eight concussion blasts at 
> Khonkolor.
